content.text: Hi!
Hello!
I'm an artist and I enjoy hiking. I'm planning to move to a new state soon. I have two border collies.
That's cool! I'm a sixth grade teacher, I enjoy crosswords, crocheting and football. I'm allergic to apples but I still eat them. I coach the girl's volleyball team.
That's interesting! I've never coached a sports team before.
It's fun! I love working with kids and teaching them new skills.
I can imagine! I love working with kids too.
What are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about moving to a new state, but I'm not sure where yet.
That's exciting! I'm sure you'll find a great place to live.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, paint, and spend time with my dogs.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go hiking too.
Me too! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree! So, what's your favorite kind of art to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits.
Those are both beautiful genres of art. I love seeing the different ways that artists capture the beauty of the world.
Me too! It's amazing how different artists can interpret the same subject matter in such different ways.
It really is. I think it's a testament to the creativity of the human spirit.
I agree!
